de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database.controlnodes

Class DbActivityInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database.DbObject
      • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database.controlnodes.DbActivityInstance

  • public class DbActivityInstance
extends DbObject
    Represents the activity instance of the database. Methods are mostly used by the HistoryService. Hence, you can get all terminated activities or start new ones.

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public AbstractStateMachine.STATE getState(int id)
        This method returns the actual state of an activity.
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of an activity instance.
        Returns:
        the state of the activity as a String.

      • setState

        public void setState(int id,
                     AbstractStateMachine.STATE state)
        This method sets the activity to a state and saves a log entry into the database.
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of an activity instance in the database.
        state - This is the state in which an activity should be after executing setState.

      • createNewActivityInstance

        public int createNewActivityInstance(int controlNodeInstanceId,
                                     java.lang.String activityType,
                                     java.lang.String activityState)
        This method creates and saves a new activity instance to the database into the context of a controlNode instance and saves a log entry into the database.
        Parameters:
        controlNodeInstanceId - This is the ID of a controlNode instance in the database.
        activityType - This is the type of an activity.
        activityState - This is the state of an activity.
        Returns:
        the database ID of the newly created activity instance as an integer (Error: -1).

      • existsActivityInstance

        public java.lang.Boolean existsActivityInstance(int controlNodeInstanceId,
                                                int scenarioInstanceId)

      • getTerminatedActivitiesForScenarioInstance

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getTerminatedActivitiesForScenarioInstance(int scenarioInstanceId)
        This method returns all database ID's for all activities who have terminated in the context of a scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        scenarioInstanceId - This is the database ID of a scenario instance.
        Returns:
        a list of activity ID's which belong to the scenario instance and are terminated.

      • getAutomaticExecution

        public boolean getAutomaticExecution(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of an activity instance.
        Returns:
        a boolean with the Automatic Execution state

      • setAutomaticExecution

        public void setAutomaticExecution(int id,
                                  boolean automaticExecution)
        Parameters:
        id - This is the database ID of an activity instance.
        automaticExecution - This is a boolean Automatic Execution state.

                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String state)
        Parameters:
        instanceID - This is the database ID of an activity instance.
        filterString - This is a filter string for labels.
        state - This is a filter for activity states.
        Returns:
        a Map of all matching activity instances
